name: Shoal (Ben Haderle)
description:
Shoal is a zen exploration game about growing a school of fish.

It takes 5 - 15 min to play.

🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟

Controls: 

Move mouse to control camera + fish

Click to use menus

Esc to pause + access options

🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟🐟

Shoal was made by Ben Haderle and Xiaocheng Tang in Andy Nealen and Peter Brinson's Interactive Design and Production class at USC in Spring 2020.  

Music is by David Lewis.  Find his work here.

Full credits are below.
